Entries.AcceptGift_book_item: Thank you! I'm almost finished with a book right now, but I'll read this one next!$h

Oh wow, this is a rare edition @!$12#$b#Where did you get it?#$b#The bookseller?$3#$b#I've seen him around, but those books look pretty expensive...$2#$b#That's why I usually go to the library instead.$1#$b#Well, I guess it's worth a visit if he's got books like this in stock.$3#$b#I'll stop by his stall next time he's in town.#$b#Thanks for the book @!$1#$action AddMail Current {{ModId}}_M1

Entries.{{ModId}}_E1/n {{ModId}}_M1/t 900 1700/w: continue/109 37/farmer 107 38 0 Penny 110 27 0 {{ModId}}_TempNPC 109 26 0/addConversationTopic PilotPenny1 5/skippable/fade/pause 200/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/viewport move 0 -8 1000/emote Penny 40/advancedMove farmer false 0 -5 2 0 0 -3 4 8000/pause 200/emote Penny 8/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 40/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/pause 200/emote Penny 56/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Penny 16/pause 200/stopAdvancedMoves/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Penny 3/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 56/pause 200/speak Penny "Hi @!$1#$b#I've been chatting with Marcello here about his books.#$b#He travels everywhere in that hot air balloon looking for new books to read and sell.#$b#It's such a cool way to distribute them!$1"/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_TempNPC "Oh, I'm flattered!"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 200/speak Penny "I've got to get going, but thank you so much for indulging my questions Marcello.#$b#And for offering to trade books with me! I'll bring some the next time you stop by.$1"/pause 200/message "Marcello: Of course Penny! You take care now. I'll keep an eye out for that series you mentioned!"/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/advancedMove Penny false 0 3 -4 0 0 5/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 100/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/message "Marcello: Now my friend, what books pique your interest today?"/pause 300/end position 109 29/fade
Entries.{{ModId}}_E2/e {{ModId}}_E1/t 900 1700/w: continue/109 29/farmer 109 27 0 Penny 110 27 0 {{ModId}}_TempNPC 109 26 0/skippable/fade/pause 200/emote Penny 56/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote Penny 8/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 40/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 16/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/speak Penny "There's so many books to choose from...#$b#How do you fit them all in your hot air balloon?"/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_TempNPC "With a lot of care!"/pause 400/message "Marcello: It's a delicate balance."/message "Marcello: I have to keep a close eye on the mass and distribution of these books while I'm flying."/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 28/message "Marcello: I may have even dropped a few at times..."/message "Marcello: Hopefully someone found them and took an interest!"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/emote Penny 56/pause 200/speak Penny "What's it like up there?#$b#I bet you have a great view of the mountains!$1"/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 40/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_TempNPC "Would you like to see it for yourself?"/pause 200/emote Penny 16/pause 200/textAboveHead Penny "M-Me?"/pause 200/message "Marcello: Of course!"/message "Marcello: I'll trade you a trip for one of these books you've brought."/message "Marcello: How does that sound?"/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/quickQuestion What do you say?#Sounds exciting! You should do it!#Sounds scary. Why don't you think about it for a bit?(break)speak Penny "Um, alright!$1#$b#If @ thinks it's a good idea, then I'm in!#$b#Just let me drop my new books off at home first."(break)speak Penny "It's true, I've never done anything like this before.#$b#Please give me a bit to decide, if that's alright?"/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_TempNPC "Sounds good!"/pause 200/message "Marcello: I'll be waiting!"/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 300/end position 109 29/fade
Entries.{{ModId}}_E6/e {{ModId}}_E5/t 900 1700/w: continue/65 30/farmer 65 33 0 Penny 65 30 1 {{ModId}}_TempNPC 66 30 3/addConversationTopic PilotPenny5 2/skippable/addTemporaryActor Marcello 16 32 66 30 3 true/fade/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 100/faceDirection Marcello 2/emote Penny 16/pause 200/speak Penny "@! We just landed.$1#$b#Marcello let me take the reins for most of the flight!#$b#I actually got to fly the balloon!$1"/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_TempNPC "You performed admirably!"/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 200/faceDirection Marcello 3/message "Marcello: You kept your hand steady on the burner and had a good sense of wind direction."/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/message "Marcello: You seem to enjoy flying a great deal."/message "Marcello: If you'd like, I can help you learn and become certified to fly on your own."/pause 200/emote Penny 16/pause 200/message "Marcello: We can even get you set up with your own balloon!"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/speak Penny "That sounds nice...$3"/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_TempNPC 32/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 200/message "Why does Penny look a bit... sad?"/pause 200//end position 109 29/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_E3/e {{ModId}}_E2/t 600 900/f: continue/26 25/farmer 15 31 0 Penny 26 24 0/addConversationTopic PilotPenny2 3/skippable/fade/pause 300/emote Penny 16/pause 200/speak Penny "I did it @!$1#$b#I went up in the hot air balloon!"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 20/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Penny "I'm sorry, I'm just so happy!$1#$b#I was really nervous at first, but Marcello explained every step to me, and that helped a lot.#$b#We went so high up!$1#$b#I could see the whole valley, and the mountain peaks, and the sea...#$b#He pointed out some nearby villages like Ridgeside and Sunberry. They looked so close by from up there!#$b#And I even saw a few of Zuzu's skyscrapers!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/emote Penny 32/pause 200/speak Penny "It was magical @...$3#$b#I wish I could go up there every day."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/emote Penny 60/speak Penny "Sorry to stop by so early, I just had to tell you all about it!$3#$b#He gave me some books to learn more about hot air balloons, so I'm going to go read them.#$b#It was good to see you @!"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 300/end/fade
Entries.{{ModId}}_E8/e {{ModId}}_E7/n {{ModId}}_: continue/26 25/farmer 15 31 0 Pam 26 24 0/addQuest {{ModId}}_Q2/skippable/fade/pause 300/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Pam "Hey, glad I caught you.#$b#Listen, I thought about what you said.$2#$b#Penny's real excited about this balloon she's building, and, well...$4#$b#The sky might be the limit, but I sure as hell won't be.$1#$b#I saved up some of my drink money.#$b#Get her some more cloth so she can build a bigger balloon, and fly even higher, wouldja?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/end/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_E9/e {{ModId}}_H3/n {{ModId}}_: continue/107 28/farmer 107 28 3 Penny 106 28 1 {{ModId}}_TempNPC -100 -100 0/addConversationTopic PilotPenny11 5/skippable/fade/pause 300/speak Penny "Ready to fly @?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/speak Penny "Let's go then.$1"/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/changeToTemporaryMap {{ModId}}_Map1/viewport -1000 -1000/warp {{ModId}}_TempNPC 17 15/warp farmer 17 15/warp Penny 18 15/positionOffset Penny 0 -18/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 200/playSound busDriveOff/pause 400/fade/viewport 17 13/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 400/playMusic moonlightJellies/pause 400/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_TempNPC "Woah"/pause 400/emote Penny 32/pause 200/speak Penny "Beautiful, isn't it?#$b#It took me a while to stop getting distracted when Marcello was teaching me.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/emote Penny 56/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/speak Penny "I'm so glad I did this.#$b#Being able to float freely above the mountains like this...#$b#All my worries and fears just melt away.#$b#I'm on top of the world up here!$1"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/emote Penny 56/pause 500/emote Penny 40/pause 200/speak Penny "I wonder what my mom will say when I bring her up here...$2"/pause 200/quickQuestion How do you respond?#She'll say she's proud of you.#She'll say she wants you to keep flying higher.#She'll ask if she can bring a drink with her.#Stay silent.(break)speak Penny "I don't know if she'll say that out loud.$3#$b#But I hope that's how she feels."(break)speak Penny "Well, the sky's the limit.$1#$b#But I hope she knows I'll always come back down to see her."(break)speak Penny "Heh, yeah...$2#$b#But that's alright.$3#$b#As long as she's still there for me."(break)pause 200\emote Penny 40\pause 200\speak Penny "Or maybe...$3#$b#...$2#$b#...maybe it doesn't matter.$3#$b#Whatever she says...$3#$b#All that matters, is that she'll be up here with me.#$b#We might have a long way to go, full of potholes and stray winds...$3#$b#But as long as she's standing here, that's good enough for me.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 300/end position 109 29/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_E4/e {{ModId}}_E3/t 1700 2200/: Saloon1/11 17/farmer 10 20 0 Pam 2 20 1 Gus 10 18 2 Emily 16 17 0 Lewis 14 20 0 Clint 19 23 3 Leah 11 21 2 Elliott 11 23 0/addConversationTopic PilotPenny3 5/skippable/fade/pause 300/emote Gus 56/pause 100/emote Leah 40/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move farmer -5 0 3 true/emote Elliott 8/pause 200/emote Clint 56/pause 200/speak Pam "Hey @, how's it going?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Pam "Good, good."/pause 300/playSound gulp/speak Pam "Didja hear?#$b#Penny got to ride in a hot air balloon!$1"/emote Leah 8/pause 200/emote farmer 20/playSound gulp/pause 100/playSound gulp/pause 200/speak Pam "I was worried it'd cost a lot...$2#$b#But she spent books instead of money.$4#$b#For an experience like that? Can't say I blame her!$1"/emote Lewis 32/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/emote Pam 40/pause 200/playSound gulp/emote Emily 40/speak Pam "I've never seen her so full of energy before.$2#$b#Like a spark just lit up inside her.$2"/pause 200/emote Elliott 28/pause 100/emote Pam 40/pause 200/speak Pam "I never wanted to drag her down, you know?$4#$b#But I always felt like she was stuck in this small town because of me.$4#$b#And now it feels like she's about to fly away...$2"/pause 200/emote Leah 32/pause 300/playMusic desolate/pause 100/playSound gulp/pause 200/speak Pam "Is it...$2#$b#Selfish...$2#$b#Of me, to want her to stay?$2#$b#Now that she might have a way out?$4"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion What do you say?#Yes, you need to let go of her and let her live her own life.#No, you just care a lot about her presence in your life.#Yes, but there's nothing wrong with feeling that way.(break)speak Pam "Yeah, you're right.$4#$b#I get in my own way enough, no need to get in her way too.#1"(break)speak Pam "Yeah, you're right.$4#$b#She's the most stable thing I've ever had, and I don't want to lose that.$2#$b#But she deserves better.$4"(break)pause 200\emote Pam 40\pause 200\speak Pam "I'm not very good at feeling... feelings.$2#$b#That's why I come here.$4#$b#That's why I have a job where I can just focus on the road.$4#$b#So I don't have think about people outside of the usual.$2#$b#'Cause that's all people are, really.$4#$b#Feelings with legs."/pause 200/emote Lewis 56/playSound gulp/pause 100/playSound gulp/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Pam "Look at me getting all sentimental.#$b#You didn't come here for that.#$b#Hey Gus! Another round!$1"/playMusic Saloon1/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_E5/e {{ModId}}_E4/t 1000 1400/: continue/15 10/farmer 10 10 3 Penny 17 12 0 Jas 17 9 2 Vincent 19 10 3 Elliott 19 5 0 Robin 3 10 0 Wizard 10 5 0 Gunther 3 8 2/addConversationTopic PilotPenny4 5/skippable/fade/pause 300/speak Penny "Today, we're going to learn about something very interesting.#$b#In front of me, I have a glass of water, a rock, and a marshmallow.#$b#The rock and the marshmallow are about the same size.#$b#If I put them into the glass of water, what do you think will happen?"/pause 200/emote Jas 40/pause 100/speak Vincent "The rock will sink because it's heavy!"/pause 200/speak Penny "Very good Vincent!"/pause 200/speak Vincent "Unless you throw it like my brother!#$b#Then it skips first!$1"/pause 200/speak Penny "That's true! But we don't have enough space in this glass to skip the rock, so it will sink.$1#$b#What about the marshmallow?"/pause 200/speak Jas "I think it will float!"/pause 200/speak Penny "That's right Jas! Why do you think that?"/pause 200/speak Jas "Because it's light! And it looks like one of my floaties!"/pause 200/emote Penny 32/pause 200/speak Penny "Alright, now let's test it."/pause 200/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/speak Penny "Looks like both of you were right!$1#$b#The rock sank and the marshmallow floated."/pause 200/emote Vincent 20/emote Jas 20/pause 200/speak Penny "But why did they do that?#$b#Why is the marshmallow lighter than the rock, even though they're both the same size?"/pause 200/emote Jas 8/emote Vincent 8/speak Penny "It's because of something very important. It's called 'density'."/pause 200/textAboveHead Jas "Dens-ity?"/textAboveHead Vincent "Den-city?"/pause 200/speak Penny "Yes, 'density'.#$b#An object's density is how tightly packed together its material is."/pause 200/pause 200/emote Jas 8/emote Vincent 8/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/speak Penny "Imagine a suitcase.#$b#If you only have a few clothes inside it, then there's lots of empty space, so its density is very low.#$b#But if there's lots of clothes stuffed inside, and it's hard to close because of that, then there's no empty space, and its density is very high."/pause 200/emote Jas 16/pause 200/speak Jas "Oh! Is that why marshmallows are so squishy?$1#$b#Aunt Marnie told me they're puffy because there's air inside them.$4"/pause 200/emote Vincent 16/pause 200/speak Vincent "Snow too! It's really fluffy!$1#$b#Until you make snowballs.#$b#Then it's really hard!$1"/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/speak Penny "That's exactly right!$1#$b#Snowballs are harder than snow because you pack it tightly together, so you take all the air out.#$b#That makes it more dense.#$b#We can do the same thing with this marshmallow! By squeezing it, we take all the air out of it. Watch!"/pause 200/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/emote Jas 16/emote Vincent 16/pause 200/speak Jas "It sank!"/pause 200/emote Penny 32/pause 200/speak Penny "Water has density too, and it's pretty heavy.#$b#When something is more dense than water, it sinks. When something is less dense than water, it floats."/pause 200/speak Vincent "That's so cool!"/pause 200/emote Penny 56/pause 200/speak Penny "Now let's get started on some worksheets to help you learn more about density..."/pause 300/end/fade
Entries.{{ModId}}_E7/e {{ModId}}_E6/t 800 1200/A: continue/15 8/farmer 13 5 0 Penny 17 5 0 Elliott 10 10 3 Evelyn 22 9 3 Lewis 4 10 0 Gunther 3 8 2/addConversationTopic PilotPenny6 5/mail {{ModId}}_M2/skippable/fade/pause 300/emote Penny 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/jump Penny/pause 100/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 200/speak Penny "Oh, @! I didn't see you there.$1#$b#I'm searching for resources to introduce the children to basic thermodynamics next.#$b#How are you?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Penny 8/pause 200/speak Penny "I seem distracted?$3#$b#...$3#$b#I guess that's true...$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Penny 40/pause 200/speak Penny "I was just thinking about Marcello's offer.$3#$b#I'd love to have my own balloon someday...#$b#But those cost a lot.$2#$b#...$2#$b#Maybe I can afford it eventually if I save up.$3"/pause 200/quickQuestion What do you say?#Maybe you can build one?#I can help you buy one!(break)speak Penny "Hmm, that could be a good idea."(break)speak Penny "I appreciate it, but I couldn't ask that of you.#$b#I know how generous you are, but I'd still always feel like I'm in your debt, and I don't want that to overshadow our relationship.#$b#Hmm...$3#$b#Maybe I could build one..."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Penny "I wonder if there's any books on building hot air balloons.#$b#It would have to follow the safety standards..."/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_M2: Hi @, I think I'll be able to build my own balloon based on some books I found and some tips Marcello gave me. It'll be a lot cheaper than buying one, at least! I can get most of the materials, but I need a lot of cloth. Can you help me? I promise to pay you back!  ^   -Penny%action AddQuest {{ModId}}_Q1%%[#]Hot Air Balloon Materials
Entries.{{ModId}}_M5: Hi @! I thought I'd update you on how my balloon pilot license is going. I got medically approved to fly by Harvey; he had a lot of questions about flying and balloons in general. He doesn't seem very interested in going up himself though. I'm currently studying for my written test. Marcello's approved my balloon design, so once I pass the test I'm going to start building it while I practice flying with him. Emily's been giving me tips about sewing and handling all the cloth I got from you.  ^   -Penny[#]Pilot Medical Certification
Entries.{{ModId}}_M6: Hi @! I passed my written test, and my balloon is almost done! I'm having my (hopefully) final check ride with Marcello soon. After that, I'll be able to start flying on my own, and even taking passengers! Maybe after that we can go for a ride.  ^   -Penny[#]Check Ride
Entries.{{ModId}}_M7: I passed my check ride! 'With flying colors' is how Marcello put it. We also tested out my new balloon. It handles wonderfully! Stop by later, and I'll take you up!  ^   -Penny[#]Ready To Fly

Entries.{{ModId}}_Q1: ItemDelivery/Cloth For Penny/Penny needs cloth to build her own hot air balloon./Deliver 50 Cloth to Penny/Penny 428 50/-1/35000/-1/false/It'll be small...$3#$b#And it won't go very high...$3#$b#But it'll work for practice at least.#$b#Thanks @!$1#$b#I'll go over the plans with Marcello before I start building it.#$action AddMail Current {{ModId}}_M3#$action AddConversationTopic PilotPenny7 3
Entries.{{ModId}}_Q2: ItemDelivery/More Cloth For Penny/Pam asked you to get more cloth for Penny's hot air balloon./Deliver 30 Cloth to Penny/Penny 428 30/-1/25000/-1/false/More cloth...?$3#$b#From my mom?!$12#$b#I can't believe it!$1#$b#Wow, I guess that means she...$7#$b#...$1#$b#Thanks for delivering this @. It means the world to me.#$action AddMail Current {{ModId}}_M4#$action AddConversationTopic PilotPenny8 5
